Discover Vlissingen & Zeeland

Vlissingen is a city with a raw edge, rich maritime history, and a unique location on the Westerschelde. Next to Sea is the ideal base for exploring not only the city but the entire province of Zeeland.

Hotspots

Vlissingen Boulevard

The longest sea promenade in the Netherlands where sea ships sail right along the coast.

Discover
Hotspots

Badstrand

The most popular urban beach, perfectly south-facing for the most sunshine hours.

Discover
Hotspots

Bellamypark

The vibrant heart with terraces, restaurants, and events.

Discover
Fine Dining

De Gevangentoren

Dining in a monumental tower with 360° views over the sea.

Discover
Grand Café

Brasserie BLVD

Trendy pavilion on the beach with stunning views.

Discover
Seafood

De Gecroonde Liefde

Atmospheric seafood restaurant at Bellamypark.

Discover
Gastrobar

De Timmerfabriek

Culinary enjoyment in an industrial historic building.

Discover
Italian

La Bella Cucina

Authentic Italian cuisine and delicacies.

Discover
Museum

MuZEEum

Maritime museum in the beautiful Lampsins House.

Discover
Attraction

Reptile Zoo Iguana

Largest indoor reptile zoo in Europe.

Discover
Monument

Michiel de Ruyter

The iconic statue of the naval hero on the Keizersbolwerk.

Discover
Monument

Oranjemolen

The only windmill in the Netherlands right by the sea.

Discover
Church

Saint Jacob's Church

Old Church from the 14th century, a beacon in the city.

Discover
Art & Nature

Wind Organ

Listen to the sounds of the wind on the Nolledijk.

Discover
Tour

Solar Train Zeeland

Discover Vlissingen and surroundings with this electric train.

Discover
Beach

Nollestrand

Quieter beach with iconic sleeping houses.

Discover
Culture

CineCity

Cinema and location of Film by the Sea festival.

Discover
Nature

Dune Walking

Beautiful walking routes through the dunes towards Dishoek.
